entry.summary: December 21, 2023 3:50 a.m. A Dense Fog Advisory is in effect through 10:00 a.m. Thursday for much of southern Oregon. The Advisory area includes central Douglas County, Josephine County and eastern Curry County....

entry.title: OREGON’S NONFARM PAYROLL EMPLOYMENT DROPS BY 7,300 JOBS IN NOVEMBER
entry.summary: December 21, 2023 3:40 a.m. In November, Oregon’s seasonally adjusted nonfarm payroll employment declined by 7,300 jobs, following a revised loss of 4,300 jobs in October.
